settings.title: What size should I get?
settings.answer: We recommend you look at our height and weight sizing guide for your ideal size. Please note that our products are configured with a relaxed fit in mind. https://standardissuetees.com/pages/sizing-guide

settings.title: What do I do if I input the wrong address?
settings.answer: Please reach out to us through our contact form with your order number. If we catch your shipment before it gets out weâ€™ll update the correct address on our end. If your shipment leaves before you contact us we will need to start an exchange process. https://standardissuetees.com/pages/contact

settings.title: When are you restocking?
settings.answer: Sign up for our email and text notifications to get the latest on resstocks and new releases.
